home_page.title: Build something extraordinary
home_page.subtitle: A modern Next.js starter template designed for developers who value quality, security, and performance.

features.title: Everything you need
features.subtitle: Built with best practices and modern tools

security.title: Security First
security.description: Environment validation, CORS, security headers, and XSS protection built-in.

testing.title: Test Ready
testing.description: Vitest and React Testing Library configured for comprehensive test coverage.

ui.title: Beautiful UI
ui.description: shadcn/ui components with Tailwind CSS for rapid, accessible development.

docker.title: Docker Ready
docker.description: Development and production containers configured and ready to deploy.

typescript.title: Type Safe
typescript.description: Full TypeScript support with strict mode for maximum type safety.

quality.title: Code Quality
quality.description: ESLint, Prettier, Husky, and Commitlint ensure consistent, high-quality code.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Building the future of web development

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We're dedicated to providing developers with the best tools and practices to build modern, secure, and performant web applications.

quality.title: Quality First
quality.description: We believe in writing clean, maintainable code that stands the test of time.

security.title: Security Focused
security.description: Security is not an afterthought. It's built into every aspect of our work.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We stay ahead of the curve, adopting the latest technologies and best practices.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.

form.name: Name
form.subject: Subject
form.success: Message sent successfully! We'll get back to you soon.

NotFound.heading: Page not found
NotFound.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

Error.title: Something went wrong
Error.description: We encountered an unexpected error. Please try again or return to the home page.

register.title: Create an account
register.description: Enter your information to create your account

success.title: Account created successfully
success.description: Your account has been created. You can now sign in.

login.title: Sign in
login.description: Enter your credentials to access your account

forgot_password.title: Reset your password
forgot_password.description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password

success.title: Check your email
success.description: We've sent a password reset link to your email address.

reset_password.title: Change your password
reset_password.description: Enter your current password and choose a new one

success.title: Password updated
success.description: Your password has been successfully updated.

verify_email.title: Verify your email
verify_email.success_message: Your email has been verified. You can now sign in to your account.
verify_email.verification_failed: Email verification failed. Please try again or contact support.
verify_email.no_code_or_email: Invalid verification link. Please check your email and try again.

resend_verification_email.title: Resend verification email
resend_verification_email.description: Enter your email address and we’ll send you a new verification email.
resend_verification_email.success_toast: Verification email sent. Please check your inbox.
resend_verification_email.error_generic: Could not send verification email. Please try again.

verify_email_otp.title: Enter verification code
verify_email_otp.description: We have sent a 6-digit verification code to your email. Enter it below to verify your email address.

fields.email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address

verify_email_otp.success_message: Your email has been verified. You can now sign in to your account.
verify_email_otp.error_message: Verification failed. Please check the code and try again.
